mapper.select: SELECT b_id,b_title,b_content,b_date,b_writer,b_group,b_order,b_depth FROM board ORDER BY b_group DESC, b_order ASC, b_depth ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (b_title, b_content, b_date,b_writer) VALUES (#{bTitle}, #{bContent}, NOW(), #{bWriter} )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET b_group=LAST_INSERT_id() WHERE b_id=LAST_INSERT_id()
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (b_title, b_content, b_date, b_group, b_order, b_depth) VALUES (#{bTitle}, #{bContent}, NOW(), #{bGroup}, #{bOrder}+1, #{bDepth}+1)
